products.title: Leonardo, Spice - Roman Blind
products.description: In gorgeously rich shades of burnt orange and regal blue, the leonardo spice makes a grand gesture, and its off-white background fits perfectly. The intricate stitching only adds to the quality feel of the fabric and the look is stunningly attractive. Bring your hallway or landing to life by adding the spice to off-white or pale oatmeal walls. Include accessories, wall art, and ornaments in matching burnt orange tones, with the occasional blue thrown in for contrast, texture, and depth.

products.title: Feather, Coffee - Roman Blind
products.description: As easy on the eye as a feather is soft to the touch, the feather in coffee blends a classic image with contemporary styling and warming colour. A latte shade takes centre stage, with feathers drawn in soft cream, giving a pretty, lightweight look and feel to the blind. Add the warmth of the coffee to a similarly toned bedroom, surrounding with shades of cream and latte throughout the room. Go for rich, plush fabrics for a feeling of homeliness and luxury, giving the room plenty of texture and depth.

products.title: Kaleidoscope, Clementine High Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.description: Clementine allows you to bring the natural warmth and energy of the summer sun into your home no matter the time of year. A calming and uplifting colour that partners perfectly with the premium gloss finish is the secret to a venetian blind that will energise your home and put you in a great mood for the rest of the day. Combine clementine with a selection of pale yellows to give your room a summery feeling that makes you feel like getting creative in the kitchen.

products.title: Morrison, Heather - Roman Blind
products.description: Use the morrison in heather to create a modish and sophisticated look with silver and lavender hues in a distinguishing and elegant design, formed from a nimble cloth with fine, silky thread to generate a graceful blind with breaths of soothing colour and creative style. By combining a stormy palette with the delicate heather, you can create a relaxing and tasteful retreat. Match the thundery tones and silver hues of the blind with alike shades and contrasting white to form an attractive base for mauve touches and connecting colour.

products.title: Kasian, Natural - Roman Blind
products.description: A neutral mixture of soft white, hushed taupe, and creamy oatmeal, the kasian natural showcases a contemporary abstract pattern that's sure to fit in anywhere. The attractive fabric, complemented by high quality fixtures, looks like it was made for those soft roman folds. Allow the natural to temper a room filled with deep chocolate tones, perhaps even against a brown feature wall, where it will offset the tones perfectly.

products.title: Kasian, Red - Roman Blind
products.description: In soft rose red, tempered by ice white and gentle taupe, the kasian in red displays a contemporary curved patterning. The quality fabric accentuates the neat folds of the roman shape, ensuring that this blind will look attractive wherever it's placed. Hang the red in a modern kitchen, surrounded by white units, walls, and furniture, and red accessories throughout. Source appliances and utensils in similar shades of red for a truly coordinated look that's sure to wow your family and guests alike.

products.title: Corsica, Mauve - Roman Blind
products.description: The light mauve and apple green of the corsica mauve are a summer dream come true, with a pretty pattern of florals and foliage interwoven with each other across a soft white canvas. The look will work as part of either a contemporary or traditional dcor scheme. Use the mauve to add some gentle colour to your bathroom, where it will look stunning against a white bathroom suite and tiling. Accent with towels and accessories in matching greens and lilacs.

products.title: Kershaw, Natural - Roman Blind
products.description: Soft neutrals and contemporary florals meld together in the kershaw natural, a beautifully styled roman blind with a timeless sense of sophisticated and an understated air that will offset most colour schemes. Bring a tempered patterning to a bright or bold feature wall in your living room, where the natural will sit pretty against a deep chocolate brown or rich red shade. Add plush fabrics to the rest of the room for a cosy feel that you'll want to sit back and relax in.

products.title: Kershaw, Wine - Roman Blind
products.description: Ever true to its name, the kershaw in wine is a striking array of deep wine red tulip-shaped florals on a neutral background of pale biscuit camel. This stylish roman blind seems contemporary yet traditional, making it well-suited to all kinds of homes and settings. Place the wine in the kitchen amidst neutral, cream, or white units, accented by matching wine reds for mood and character. Go for clean lines and straight edges to keep the look simple yet effective.

products.title: Kershaw, Gold - Roman Blind
products.description: The kershaw gold features a neutral blend of soft golds and gentle greys in the form of contemporary florals on a golden oatmeal background. The outcome is one of modern traditionalism, with an understated yet pretty effect that will suit any home. Use the gold as a subtle feature in a hallway or landing, where you might not want to overpower a smaller space but would like to add some interest and definition.

products.title: Radiance Pumice Natural Curtain
products.description: This elegant curtain is adorned with beautiful embroidery depicting a bohemian style pattern. The radiance pumice natural curtain is made with a polyester and viscose mix fabric that adds a delicate sheen to the finish. Highly versatile in a neutral beige shade, this fully lined curtain will provide a distinct and luxurious window dressing. Product id: db-cur1185 fabric colour: pumice material: 73% polyester 27% viscose lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes radiance pumice natural curtain in cream/brown.

products.title: Radiance Otter Grey Curtain
products.description: The radiance otter grey curtain is an elegant addition to any living space thanks to the luxuriously embroidered design. The pattern boasts a bohemian vibe that flows beautifully across the shimmery polyester and viscose mix fabric. The textured grey tone will complement minimalist and neutral schemes as well as pairing smartly with a range of on-trend colours. Product id: db-cur1187 fabric colour: otter grey material: 73% polyester 27% viscose lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes radiance otter grey curtain in grey.

products.title: Angle Embroidered Marshmallow Curtain
products.description: Create movement through your home with their angle embroidered marshmallow curtain inspired by bauhaus school of design this interlocking geometric design is carefully embroidered with threads of blush pink, teal blue with strokes of burnt orange and red. The linen blend base will ensure your blind sits beautifully in the room of your choice. From the prestigious abstract collection this fabric was designed to celebrate 100 years of influential hallmarks.

products.title: Radiance Chrome Curtain
products.description: Make an elegant update with this beautiful curtain featuring a bohemian inspired pattern that is delicate and subtle in white yet enhanced with textured embroidery. The radiance chrome curtain is made from cool grey, polyester and viscose mix fabric that gives a silvery shimmer to the finish. Product id: db-cur1186 fabric colour: chrome material: 73% polyester 27% viscose lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes radiance chrome curtain in grey.

products.title: Menara Palm Embroidered Olive Curtain
products.description: The menara embroidered olive-green roman blind will be sure to add a sense of style to your home, perfect for any living space the delicately embroidered green trees add instant texture and depth. Hand selected from the clarke & clarke prince of persia collection, we never compromise on quality and this fabric is sure to compliment your window for years to come. At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why this curtain comes with their free five-year guarantee and customer-first service.

products.title: Eskdale Weave Coral Curtain
products.description: Their eskdale weave coral fabric features a large thistle woven fabric, with intricate cream threads woven onto a muted coral-orange background. A cotton/poly blend fabric, these curtains will add warmth and a touch luxury to any room. Pair with elegant neutrals and wooden tones to create a stunning finish for your room. Perfect for living rooms or bedrooms with their blackout lining options. All their curtains are lovingly handmade within the uk.

products.title: Ascot Powder Pink Curtain
products.description: The beautiful embroidery on this curtain creates a rich texture and enhances the fine detail of the motif. The powder pink hue of the ascot curtain gives it a subtle vintage charm that will compliment a range of settings. The fabric is fully lined enhancing the thickness and decorative appeal of this curtain. products.title: Ascot Mist Grey Curtain
products.description: The graceful grey embroidery on this fabric curtain stands out on a soft cream backdrop to create a textured design that is simple yet striking. The cool colour palette and botanical design makes the ascot mist grey curtain very on trend and is sure to complement a range of settings. products.title: Ascot Canvas Curtain
products.description: The fully lined ascot canvas curtain features a gentle motif of vines that has a soft and contemporary feel thanks to the cool grey hue of the background fabric. The pattern is picked out in elegant embroidery and is a great way to soften the look of a modern interior with textiles. products.title: Secret Oasis Velour Rouge Curtain
products.description: Combining bold colour with a huge scale floral print the secret oasis rouge curtain is a soft velvet-feel velour fabric that will have a spectacular effect in any room. This design is a definite talking point paired with faux foliage the adventure is endless. At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why this curtain comes with their free five-year guarantee and customer-first service.

products.title: Dragonfly Aqua Curtain
products.description: Their dragonfly range, inspired by the same winged water insect, combined modern design with contemporary trend shades to create this a highly sought-after fabric. This aqua blue dragonfly curtain blind, on a soft white background, makes this muted curtain a must for nature lovers. Produced from a cotton/linen mix, this blind is fully breathable, so whichever room you choose to adorn, you can be confident that this dragonfly aqua curtain is suitable.
